title: Top 10 Best Paper Manufacturing Companies In India 2024 - Inventiva
summary: India's paper manufacturing industry is thriving, with top companies like ITC PSPD, BILT, and JK Paper leading the way. These companies are prioritizing sustainability and innovation, adopting eco-friendly practices and investing in technology to enhance efficiency. They're also diversifying product portfolios and expanding into new markets to secure future growth.
likely_naics_codes: ['322120', 'Paper (except Newsprint) Mills', '322130', 'Newsprint Mills', '322110', 'Pulp Mills', '423820', 'Paper Merchant Wholesalers']
greenwashing: The article does not provide evidence of greenwashing by any of the companies mentioned, highlighting their commitment to sustainable practices.
